headline: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi Says 'Majority Of Our Trips' Could Be Fulfilled By Robots Within 20 Years: 'You Have To Get The Regulations Up'
summary: Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) chief executive officer Dara Khosrowshahi said he expects robotaxis to handle most trips on the platform within two decades as the company accelerates its push into autonomous vehicle technology. Robotaxi Expansion Push On Monday, Khosrowshahi said in a podcast on The Diary of a CEO interview that the majority of Uber rides could eventually be fulfilled by automated vehicles, though he acknowledged the shift will take 15 to 20 years. headline: Lucid Balances Job Cuts And Robotaxi Push As Financial Pressures Persist
summary: Lucid Group (NasdaqGS:LCID) is cutting about 12% of its U.S. workforce as part of a broad cost saving effort. The company is pairing these reductions with new partnerships with Uber and Nuro to enter the robotaxi market. These moves come as Lucid reports record vehicle deliveries alongside ongoing financial pressures. For you as an investor, this reflects a complex mix of contraction and expansion. Lucid is known for premium electric vehicles, and record deliveries highlight product demand,...
